# Reconstruct (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Construct touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fort negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mage's Tower

*Reconstruct* enables you to channel energy into a construct to wipe away damage and afflictions. It immediately ends any and all of the following adverse conditions affecting the target: ability damage, [[Blinded|blinded]], [[Broken|broken]], [[Confused|confused]], [[Dazed|dazed]], [[Dazzled|dazzled]], [[Deafened|deafened]], diseased, [[Exhausted|exhausted]], [[Fatigued|fatigued]], feebleminded, insanity, [[Nauseated|nauseated]], poisoned, [[Sickened|sickened]], and [[Stunned|stunned]]. It also repairs 10 hit points of damage per level of the caster, to a maximum of 150 points at 15th level.
